channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street sign bent, 18th December
item.description:
The street sign outside number 1 Calendula court. See photo. This has been like this for over a year. I have only just discovered that these issues can be reported. Sorry for the late notice.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public right of way blocked by animals, 18th December
item.description:
No fewer than 5 horses gathered at the gate into the field on path between Shaw Green Lane and the footpath to Prestbury Mill Street. There are usually three horses in this field and now five. They are large and intimidating and easily spooked. Please advise the land owner to remove the horses to a secure field or fence the pathway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Shaw Green Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just a Massive, Massive' Thankyou to all of your Team & Engineers, that have been involved, & attended & addressed the problem of this noisy Drainage cover outside of 52 Cheltenham Road East, Last night they worked through the Rain & elements & we have finally got closure on the Noisy metal cover, that has been plaguing us for weeks' Thankyou ! For yor understanding and help sorting this üòäüëåüèºüëçüèº, 18th December

item.title: Large tree growing outside house and lifting the pavement substantially. Roots possibly going under house and causing damage, 18th December
item.description:
It is the large tree growing outside 79 Naunton Park Road. It has been lifting the pavement more and more for a number of years. My son tripped and damaged his knee today. I am also starting to be concerned about the damage the roots may be doing the other side to my house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Naunton Terrace, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: East verge of bays hill road covered in thick piles of leaves, 18th December
item.description:
The grass verges on the east side of the road - large sections remain covered in piles of decaying leaves despite the ones having been cleared on the opposite side of the road. The leaves are turning the verges to mud and are preventing grass from growing. They should have been cleared weeks ago but are now being left to rot in unsightly piles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins permanently stored on verge, 17th December
item.description:
Bins have been there for several months, permanently kept on the verge. There have now been two occasions I‚Äôve been unable to pass due to the bins blown over by the strong winds across the path and cars always parked along this stretch of path. I have seen people with pushchairs and. Mobility scooters having to cross the busy road to get around.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Welch Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noise Noise Noise !!, 17th December
item.description:
The newley repaired/installed Surface water drain is now more vocal than ever ! This has had 3 attempted fixes & somehow' None have been successful! Must be costing a fortune' not a road engineer but surely why can't a permanent fix be applied, it's driving us residents crazy !!! Reply please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing sigage Bollard for crossing, 17th December
item.description:
It looks like this may now be being resolved, but on Sunday, 16th November, due to the missing bollard, my wife was unable to see the kerb and as a result damaged two tyres irreparably. Please can this be fixed and please can you tell me where I make the claim for the damage caused to the car as a result of this missing essential road sinage?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185, Hewlett Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
